1370: Siccone moved to Die lange straet3.E.5 after marriage.
Got married to Folqui at age 35 in 1370.
1372: Had a son with Folqui, Wolbrand, at age 37.
1373: Had a daughter with Folqui, Badeloghen, at age 38.
1374: Had a daughter with Folqui, Liudburgis, at age 39.
1375: Had a son with Folqui, Samuel, at age 40.
1377: Had a daughter with Folqui, Aghete, at age 42.
1378: Had a son with Folqui, Moys, at age 43.
1379: Lost son Moys when Moys was 2 years old.
1382: Had a daughter with Folqui, Jacomin, at age 47.
